30427.name: Fertilizers: Potash Fertilizers (K20 total nutrients) - Average use per area of cropland (FAO (2017))
30427.description: The data describe the average use of chemical and mineral fertilizers per area of cropland (arable land and permanent crops) at national, regional, and global level in a time series from 2002 to 2014.

source.name: Fertilizers - FAO (2017)
source.dataPublishedBy: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO) (2017)
source.dataPublisherSource: Data from FAOSTAT/ResourcesSTAT Fertilizers Section and Land Section.
source.additionalInfo:
: 
The indicator is defined as the annual agricultural use of nutrient Nitrogen N (total), nutrient Phosphate P2O5 (total), and nutrient K2O (total) divided by the area of croplands (arable and permanent crops).
